Episodes.Title: The New World (1)
Episodes.Plot: Ryland and other government officials are on trial for withholding vital information that they discovered about the returnees when a disturbing sound is heard the courtroom. Tom and Diana, with the help of Gary Navarro, try and track down T.J Kim, who they believe is responsible for the piercing sound heard in the courtroom. Richard and Lily are forced to deal with a now grown Isabelle While Lily also suffers from a rapid aging disease that Shawn is unable to heal. Tom and Diana also investigate
Episodes.GuestStars: Peter Bryant,  Matthew Gray,  Jocelyn  Loewen,  Andrew Kavadas,  Ian Tracey,  Leanne  Adachi,  Fred Henderson,  Sharif Atkins,  Tippi Hedren

Episodes.Title: The New World (2)
Episodes.Plot: Gary Navarro is arrested for the second attempt to assassinate Dennis Ryland.  Knowing she is the key to her mother's survival, Isabelle attempts to kill herself by jumping off the 4400 center building only to survive without a scratch. Matthew Ross expresses his displeasure at her actions and tells her of the destiny she is to face.  Isabelle is troubled about what Matthew told her, but after a discussion with Shawn she decides it's her choice with what she does with her life. Matthew  gives Is
Episodes.GuestStars: Peter Coyote,  Tippi Hedren,  Sharif Atkins,  Jeffrey Combs

Episodes.Title: Being Tom Baldwin
Episodes.Plot: Tom is accused of murdering TJ Kim. 17 year old Boyd Gelder has the ability to change his appearance whenever he chooses. Meanwhile, Shawn and Isabelle grow closer.
Episodes.GuestStars: Leanne  Adachi,  Barbara Tyson,  Mike Power,  Sean Marquette,  Cameron McDonald

Episodes.Title: Gone (1)
Episodes.Plot: Someone is targeting young 4400's and Maia gets kidnapped. A mistake from Shawn's past comes back to haunt him. Richard is given a position of authority at the 4400 Center.
Episodes.GuestStars: Alice Krige,  Kathryn Gordon,  Sophie Barnett,  Cainan Wiebe,  Alexia Fast,  Matthew Gray,  Julia Tortolano

Episodes.Title: Gone (2)
Episodes.Plot: Tom and Diana continue to investigate the disappearance of the 4400 children. Isabelle and Shawn's relationship becomes public.
Episodes.GuestStars: Sophie Barnett,  Cainan Wiebe,  Alexia Fast,  Matthew Gray,  Julian Christopher,  Kevin McNulty,  Alice Krige,  Ian Tracey,  Jonathan Holmes

Episodes.Title: Graduation Day
Episodes.Plot: Isabelle seeks revenge on the Nova Group after they attack Shawn. Alana confronts the man responsible for killing her husband and son in a car accident nine years ago.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kurt Fuller,  Erica Carroll,  Emilio Salituro,  Deni De Lory,  Danny Dorosh,  Ulla Friis,  Julia Tortolano,  Rob LaBelle,  Ian Tracey,  Carter Jenkins

Episodes.Title: The Home Front
Episodes.Plot: With the help of Dennis Ryland, NTAC track down the remining members of the NOVA group. Nikki pays Shawn a visit.
Episodes.GuestStars: Julia Tortolano,  Hilary Strang,  Sharif Atkins,  Brooke Nevin,  Aaron Craven,  Lloyd Adams,  David Mackay,  Kathryn Gordon

Episodes.Title: Blink
Episodes.Plot: Tom and Diana are drugged with a hallucinogen, that was created from oil that was secreted from the hands of a 4400.
Episodes.GuestStars: Matt Anderson,  Reynaldo Rosales,  Paul Belsito,  Adam Battrick,  Mercedes De La Zerda,  Nancy Sivak,  Christopher Kennedy,  Brian Dennehy,  John Prowse,  Aili Storen,  Richard Kahan,  Chilton Crane,  Linda Darl

Episodes.Title: The Ballad of Kevin and Tess
Episodes.Plot: Kevin Burkoff  becomes a marked man when his research on promicin is discovered. When Tom and Diana search for him, they discover how far he will go to protect his work. Shawn meets his idol at the 4400 Center.
Episodes.GuestStars: Erin Borgfjord,  David Milchard,  Conrad Burek,  Grace Sherman,  Brandy Heidrick,  Danielle Kremeniuk,  Nancy Sivak,  Michael Kopsa,  Richard Kahan,  Neil Hopkins,  Kathryn Gordon

Episodes.Title: The Starzl Mutation
Episodes.Plot: Tom and Diana's investigation into a series of gruesome murders leads them to uncover another conspiracy within the government. At the 4400 Center, Shawn receives a gift from another returnee that allows him to see his future.

Episodes.Title: The Gospel According to Collier
Episodes.Plot: NTAC and the 4400 Center work together to find Jordan Collier. Kyle Baldwin gets a surprising visitor at the state prison.
Episodes.GuestStars: Bill Campbell,  Chilton Crane,  Chad Faust,  Jody Thompson,  Natasha Gregson Wagner,  Brennan Elliott,  Tom McBeath,  Jill Morrison,  Judith Maxie,  Kavan Smith

Episodes.Title: Terrible Swift Sword
Episodes.Plot: NOVA group members that were in the custody of NTAC escape from jail with outside help from Jordan Collier. Diana tells April about her relationship with Ben. Shawn and Richard learn that Isabelle is working with Dennis Ryland.

Episodes.Title: Fifty-Fifty
Episodes.Plot: Tom and Diana continue their investigation on Jordan Collier's plan for mankind. Dennis Ryland rejoins NTAC. Isabelle prepares for battle.
Episodes.GuestStars: Sean Marquette,  Brennan Elliott,  Natasha Gregson Wagner,  Peter Coyote,  Kavan Smith,  Richard Kahan,  Bill Campbell,  Jody Thompson,  Chad Faust
